info.title: Encodian
info.description: Enhanced document format conversion, OCR, watermarking, data extraction, redaction + much more.

license.name: Requires an 'Encodian for Power Automate' subscription

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoBasicConversion

post.description: Convert a document to PDF or PDF/A format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011123574-Convert-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertToPdfA

post.description: Convert a PDF document to PDF/A format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360010578413-Convert-PDF-to-PDFA

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSecurePdf

post.description: Encrypt and protect a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011330134-Secure-PDF-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSetPdfPrivileges

post.description: Set the privledges assigned to the PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011337094-Set-PDF-Document-Privileges

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoTextToPdf

post.description: Convert the text provided to a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011683054-Convert-Text-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoHtmlToPdf

post.description: Convert the HTML or Web URL provided to a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360022205154-Convert-HTML-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoHtmlToWord

post.description: Convert the HTML or Web URL provided to a Microsoft Word document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011823213-Convert-HTML-to-Word

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoInsertHtmlToPdf

post.description: Insert the HTML provided into a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011784354-Insert-HTML-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoMergeDocumentsToPdf

post.description: Convert and merge the documents provided to a single PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011886173-Merge-documents-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoMergeArrayOfDocumentsToPdf

post.description: Convert and merge an array of documents to a single PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360014632213-Merge-document-array-to-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoMergeArrayOfDocumentsToWord

post.description: Merge an array of Microsoft Word documents to a single Microsoft Word document (DOCX) - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360023972213-Merge-document-array-to-Word

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoOcrPdf

post.description: Perform OCR on an existing PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012686653-OCR-a-PDF-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSplitDocument

post.description: Split a PDF Document into multiple PDF Documents - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360002953277-Split-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSplitPdfByText

post.description: Split a PDF Document by text into multiple PDF Documents - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012726397-Split-PDF-by-Text

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSplitPdfByBarcode

post.description: Split a PDF Document by Barcode, returning multiple PDF Documents - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013629457-Split-PDF-by-Barcode

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoWordToPdfForm

post.description: Convert the Word document provided (Legacy Form Controls Only) to a PDF form document. - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012307133-Convert-Word-to-PDF-Form

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddTextWatermark

post.description: Add a text watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012230494-Add-Text-Watermark

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddImageWatermark

post.description: Add an image watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012484094-Add-Image-Watermark

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddTextWatermarkAdv

post.description: Add a text watermark to the specified PDF document using the advanced options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012345813-Add-Text-Watermark-Advanced-

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddImageWatermarkAdv

post.description: Add an image watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012485874-Add-Image-Watermark-Advanced-

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageCleanUpDoc

post.description: Execute image clean up activities focussed on text based images such as Deskew, Rotate, Despeckle + more.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageCleanUpPhoto

post.description: Execute image clean up activities for standard photo images.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoExtractTextRegion

post.description: Extract text using OCR from 70+ files types using specified regions - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015612353-Extract-Text-from-Regions

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddHtmlHeaderFooter

post.description: Add a HTML header, footer or both to the specified PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013808614-Add-HTML-Header-or-Footer

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoAddPageNumbers

post.description: Add page numbers to the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360014464534-Add-Page-Numbers

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoGetPdfTextLayer

post.description: Get the text layer for the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015539373-Get-PDF-Text-Layer

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoRedactPdf

post.description: Apply the specified redactions to the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360018607954-Redact-PDF-

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageResize

post.description: Resize and compress the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360018591034-Resize-an-Image

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoGetPdfFormData

post.description: Extract PDF form data from a PDF Form - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360035107433-Get-PDF-Form-Data

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSearchAndReplaceText

post.description: Find and replace text contained within a PDF or DOCX document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360020937853-Search-and-Replace-Text

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoSearchAndReplaceTextWithImage

post.description: Find and replace text contained within a PDF or DOCX document with an image - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360027234874

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertPdfToWord

post.description: Convert a PDF document to Microsoft Word (docx) format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360027229294-Convert-PDF-to-Word

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageCompress

post.description: Compress the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360027350513-Compress-an-Image

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoZipArrayOfDocuments

post.description: Add the files provided to an archive (.zip) file - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360002674918-Add-to-Archive-ZIP

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoGetPdfDocumentInfo

post.description: Get PDF Document Information (Number of Pages, File Size + more) - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360002949358-Get-PDF-Document-Information

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoUnlockPdf

post.description: Decrypt and remove password protection from a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360003714237-Unlock-PDF-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoParseCsv

post.description: Parse CSV and return the extracted data in JSON format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360005177297-Parse-CSV

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoCreateQrCode

post.description: Create a QR code in the specified image format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360005178237-Create-QR-Code

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoReadQrCodeFromImage

post.description: Read a QR code from the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006170898-Read-QR-Code-Image

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoReadQrCodeFromDocument

post.description: Read a QR code(s) from the document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006165437-Read-QR-Code-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoResponseCreateBarcode

parameters.name: barcodeTypeParameter
parameters.description: Set the barcode type

post.description: Create a Barcode in the specified image format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006165457-Create-Barcode

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoReadBarcodeFromImage

post.description: Read a barcode from the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006170918-Read-Barcode-Image

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoReadBarcodeFromDocument

post.description: Read barcode(s) from the document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006170938-Read-Barcode-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageConvertFormat

post.description: Convert the format of the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006617857-Convert-Image-Format

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoRegexSearchText

post.description: Search the text provided to find matches using the regex provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006764638-Search-Text-Regex

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoExtractTextRegion

post.description: Extract images from PDF using specified regions - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006998058-Extract-Images-from-PDF

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoImageExtractText

post.description: Extract text from the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360006998078-Extract-Text-from-Image-OCR

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoFillPdfForm

post.description: Fill the PDF Form provided with the JSON data provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360008556077-Fill-a-PDF-Form

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertMailMessage

post.description: Convert an email to PDF - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011566298-Convert-Mail-Message

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertExcel

parameters.name: outputFormatParameter
parameters.description: Set the output file type

post.description: Convert Microsoft Excel documents to another document format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011804178-Convert-Excel

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertWord

parameters.name: outputFormatParameter
parameters.description: Set the output file type

post.description: Convert Microsoft Word documents to another document format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015616117-Convert-Word

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoConvertPowerPoint

parameters.name: outputFormatParameter
parameters.description: Set the output file type

post.description: Convert Microsoft PowerPoint documents to another document format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015879777-Convert-PowerPoint
Create a Hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) using a secret key - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012782058-Create-HMAC
Create a hashcode for the string provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013996077-Create-Hash-Code
Add a Text Watermark to the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013560398-Add-Text-Watermark-To-Image

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoCompareWordDocuments

post.description: Compare differences between Microsoft Word and PDF Documents - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360018576278-Compare-Word-Documents

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoPopulateWordDocument

post.description: Populate a Microsoft Word Document (DOCX) with the JSON data provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019620578-Populate-Word-Document

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object, refer to schema definition: DtoCompressPdf

post.description: Compress and optimise a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019994857-Compress-PDF

FileName.description: The filename of the source file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.xlsx' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: The file content of the source file

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output PDF document

removeDocumentMarkup.description: Set MS Office document comments and tracked changes removal option

pdfaComplianceLevel.description: Set the PDF/A Compliance Level, the default value is PDF_A_2A.

GenerateBookmarks.description: Set whether bookmarks should be automatically created for Microsoft Word documents which are converted to PDF.

CultureName.description: Change the thread culture used to process the request.

FinalOperation.description: Advanced - Return the processed file (File Contents) as opposed to just an Operation ID, please review before using - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360010509573-Flow-Action-Return-Options-File-Content-vs-Operation-ID

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output PDF document

fileContent.description: Optional - Please provide either The file content of the source file and source filename or text data.

textData.description: Optional - Please provide either the text data which will be converted to a PDF document or The file content of the source file and source filename.

textEncodingType.description: The encoding type used for text conversion.

FinalOperation.description: Advanced - Return the processed file (File Contents) as opposed to just an Operation ID, please review before using - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360010509573-Flow-Action-Return-Options-File-Content-vs-Operation-ID

FileName.description: The filename of the source HTML file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.html' and not 'file'

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output PDF document

fileContent.description: Optional - The file content of the source HTML file.

htmlData.description: Optional - The HTML which will be converted to a PDF document

htmlUrl.description: Optional - The web address to the web page which will be converted to a PDF document

pageSize.description: Set the page size for the output PDF document, A4 is the default size.

viewPort.description: Set the viewport used to render the HTML.

enableBookmarks.description: Enable or disable auto creation of PDF bookmarks.

createPdfForm.description: Set whether the HTML content should be converted to a PDF form.

decodeHtmlData.description: Set whether the data provided in the HTML Data field should be decoded.

cssType.description: Set whether the standard or print style sheets should be used for HTML conversion.

repeatTableHeader.description: Set whether to repeat the table header on every page break. The default value is true

repeatTableFooter.description: Set whether to repeat the table footer on every page break. The default value is true

splitTextLines.description: Set whether to split text lines

encoding.description: Set the encoding type for the HTML.

delay.description: Set the delay in milliseconds between the HTML being received and the conversion to allo time for JavaScript to load.

FinalOperation.description: Advanced - Return the processed file (File Contents) as opposed to just an Operation ID, please review before using - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360010509573-Flow-Action-Return-Options-File-Content-vs-Operation-ID

FileName.description: The filename of the source HTML file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.html' and not 'file'

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output DOCX document

fileContent.description: Optional - The file content of the source HTML file.

htmlData.description: Optional - The HTML which will be converted to a Word document

htmlUrl.description: Optional - The web address to the web page which will be converted to a Word document

pageSize.description: Set the page size for the output Word document, A4 is the default size.

decodeHtmlData.description: Set whether the data provided in the HTML Data field should be decoded.

encoding.description: Set the encoding type for the HTML.

MarginTop.description: Set the top margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginBottom.description: Set the bottom margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginRight.description: Set the right margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginLeft.description: Set the left margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates it so that the text on it is upright oriented

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 60.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them.

AdjustBrightnessContrast.description: This action analyzes a document and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast based on the analysis.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document,this is disabled by default.

SmoothBackground.description: This works only on color and grayscale documents. This operation smoothes background colors to eliminate or de-emphasize noise.

SmoothObjects.description: This only works on bitonal documents, it looks at groups of pixels, and finds isolated bumps and pits in the edges of those objects, and fills them in.

RemoveDotShading.description: This action will remove shaded regions from bitonal documents.

ImageDetergent.description: Image Detergent works by changing pixels of similar color values to a central color value, which has the result of smoothing the image wherever regions of those colors appear.

ApplyAverageFilter.description: Performs a 3x3 Average filter smoothing operation on the document, placing the output in the center of the window.

RemoveHolePunch.description: Detects and removes hole punch marks from a bitonal document.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images.

RemoveBlankPages.description: Set whether blank pages should be removed from the PDF document.

Text.description: The text to embed as a watermark within the document. Add carriage return control characters (backslash r) to manually split text onto new lines.

skipFirstPage.description: Set whether to skip applying the watermark to the first page.

ApplyTo.description: Set where in the document to apply the watermark.

pageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the watermark should be applied, this proporty only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

ignorePageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the watermark should not applied, this property only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

Font.description: The font applied to the text watermark, the default font is set to Arial.

TextColour.description: The HTML colour applied to the text watermark, the default colour is set to #E81123.

TextSize.description: The size of the font applied to the text watermark, the default size is set to 34.

Opacity.description: The opacity of the text watermark, valid values range from 0.0+ to 1.0, the default value is 1.0

EncodingType.description: The encoding type to apply to the text watermark.

HorizontalAlignment.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

VerticalAlignment.description: Set the vertical alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

TextAlignment.description: Set the text alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

RotationAngle.description: Set the rotation angle of the text watermark.

TextWrap.description: Set whether the text watermark should automatically wrap.

TextWrapRowWidth.description: Set the row width applied when the watermark is set to automatically wrap.

AutoScale.description: Set the whether the text should be automatically sized to fit the width of the container.

AutoScaleWidth.description: Set the width of the watermark container when automatic scaling is enabled.

AutoScaleHeight.description: Set the height of the watermark container when automatic scaling is enabled.

TextLayer.description: Set whether the watermark should be added to the top or bottom layer. If 'True' the watermark is added to the bottom layer.

YIndent.description: Set the vertical watermark indent, starting from the bottom and overriding the VerticalAlignment property.

XIndent.description: Set the horizontal watermark indent, starting from the left and overriding the HorizontalAlignment property.

watermarkApplyAsImage.description: Set whether the text watermark should be added as text or an image.

cleanUpType.description: Perform file clean-up operations, the default option will auto rotate, apply colour balance, auto deskew and auto despeckle the provided file.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew, this is enabled by default.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them, this is enabled by default.

ColorBalance.description: Restores and balances the color quality within an image, this is enabled by default.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document, this is disabled by default.

Contrast.description: Adjusts the contrast in the current image.

RemoveRedeye.description: Automatically reduces the red reflection of the flash seen in the eyes of people in color flash photo images.

Blur.description: Blurs the current image by averaging each pixel with each of its neighboring pixels giving it an 'out of focus' appearance.

Diffuse.description: Diffuses the current image by replacing each pixel with a randomly selected neighboring pixel.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images, this is disabled by default.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates so that the text is upright oriented, this is enabled by default.

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 40.

text.description: The text to search with the regex string provided

query.description: The regex query to use to find matches in the string provided

ecmaScript.description: Enables ECMAScript-compliant behavior for the expression. This value can be used only in conjunction with the IgnoreCase and Multiline options. Disabled by default.

explicitCapture.description: Specifies that the only valid captures are explicitly named or numbered groups of the form, disabled by default.

ignoreCase.description: Specifies case-insensitive matching, disabled by default.

ignoreWhitespace.description: Eliminates unescaped white space from the pattern and enables comments marked with #, disabled by default.

multiline.description: Changes the meaning of ^ and $ so they match at the beginning and end, respectively, of any line, and not just the beginning and end of the entire string, disabled by default.

rightToLeft.description: Specifies that the search will be from right to left instead of from left to right, disabled by default.

singleline.description: Specifies single-line mode. Changes the meaning of the dot (.) so it matches every character (instead of every character except \n), disabled by default.

matches.description: The matches found in the text provided

cleanUpType.description: Perform document clean-up operations, the default option will auto rotate, auto deskew and auto despeckle the document.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates it so that the text on it is upright oriented

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 70.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them.

AdjustBrightnessContrast.description: This action analyzes a document and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast based on the analysis.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document,this is disabled by default.

SmoothBackground.description: This works only on color and grayscale documents. This operation smoothes background colors to eliminate or de-emphasize noise.

SmoothObjects.description: This only works on bitonal documents, it looks at groups of pixels, and finds isolated bumps and pits in the edges of those objects, and fills them in.

RemoveDotShading.description: This action will remove shaded regions from bitonal documents.

ImageDetergent.description: Image Detergent works by changing pixels of similar color values to a central color value, which has the result of smoothing the image wherever regions of those colors appear.

ApplyAverageFilter.description: Performs a 3x3 Average filter smoothing operation on the document, placing the output in the center of the window.

RemoveHolePunch.description: Detects and removes hole punch marks from a bitonal document.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images.

Text.description: The text layer extracted from the image.

caseInsensitive.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in documents as case insensitive

ignoreComments.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in comments

ignoreTables.description: Specifies whether to compare the differences in data contained in tables

ignoreFields.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in fields. By default fields

ignoreFootnotes.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in footnotes and endnotes

ignoreTextboxes.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in the data contained within text boxes

ignoreHeadersAndFooters.description: Specifies whether to compare differences in the data contained within headers and footers

compressImages.description: Contained images will be compressed, aligned to the value of the 'Image Quality' property

imageQuality.description: Sets the quality for compressed images: 1 > 100

maxResolution.description: Specifies the maximum resolution of images (dpi), if the image has a higher resolution it will be scaled dynamically.

resizeImages.description: If 'Compress Images' and 'Resize Images' are enabled, images will be resized where the image resolution is greater than the specified 'Max Resolution' property.

removePrivateInfo.description: Remove private information from the PDF document, i.e. page piece information.

removeUnusedObjects.description: Remove all unused objects (i.e. objects which do not have a reference) are removed from PDF document.

removeUnusedStreams.description: Remove all unused resources from the PDF document.

linkDuplicateStreams.description: Link duplicate streams and store them as a single object. This can decrease document size in some cases (for example, where the same document was merged multiple times).

allowReusePageContent.description: Page contents will be reused when the PDF document is optimized for equal pages.

unembedFonts.description: Remove all embedded fonts. The document size will decrease but the document may become unreadable if the correct font is not installed on the user's machine.

flattenAnnotations.description: Flatten all annotations contained within the PDF document.

deleteAnnotations.description: Delete all annotations contained within the PDF document.

flattenFields.description: Flatten all fields contained within the PDF document (AcroForms only).
